The user creates a thousand long needles from the nearby [[water]], which surround the target. The user carefully aims the needles at the target and fires them at rapid speeds. Targets who are struck by the needles suffer significant injury.<ref name="d1"/> When [[Haku]] uses this technique against [[Sasuke Uchiha]], Sasuke is able to escape harm by leaping directly upwards.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 24</ref>

== Trivia ==
* This technique's complete name is {{translation|Secret Technique: Thousand Flying Water Needles of Death|秘術・千殺水翔|Hijutsu: Sensatsu Suishō}}.
